item.title: By: Screaming about Scream: the Horror Film Franchise That Still Delivers – Eve Taft

item.description: […] over details and Easter eggs in minute detail, and generally being a huge nerd about this stuff. So here is February’s Quaint and Curious Volumes, in which I got to do all of this […]
